channel.title: [EasyRSC] How do I create a new NPC?
channel.description:
I have editted an "unicorn" to be "charlie the unicorn" I used all of the unicorns codes, just changed name, description, drops, and stats. I made the change both in NPCLoc,NPCDef, and NPC.xlm but nothing shows up. If someoen could help me i would be great this is the current code for charlie:
<NPCDef> <name>Charlie The Unicorn</name> <description>I'm famous!</description> <command></command> <attack>100</attack> <strength>200</strength> <hits>1000</hits> <defense>100</defense> <attackable>true</attackable> <aggressive>true</aggressive> <respawnTime>50</respawnTime> <sprites> <int>130</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> <int>-1</int> </sprites> <hairColour>0</hairColour> <topColour>0</topColour> <bottomColour>0</bottomColour> <skinColour>0</skinColour> <camera1>201</camera1> <camera2>230</camera2> <walkModel>6</walkModel> <combatModel>6</combatModel> <combatSprite>7</combatSprite> <drops> <ItemDropDef> <id>814</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>0</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>10</id> <amount>10000</amount> <weight>50</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>619</id> <amount>20</amount> <weight>50</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>593</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>100</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>597</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>100</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>795</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>200</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>1278</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>300</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>594</id> <amount>1</amount> <weight>150</weight> </ItemDropDef> </drops> </NPCDef>

item.title: [EasyRSC] How do I create a new NPC?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:11, topic:283152”]Theres a KBD in every source

go to your NPCloc.xml

The ID for a KBD is 477

Search for:

id>477

In NPCLoc.xml[/quote]

Search for:

<id>477</id>

Read full topic

item.title: [EasyRSC] How do I create a new NPC?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Make sure you compress it correctly.

The NPCLoc’s doesn’t need adding client side.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2009, 02:08:04 pm[/size][hr]Also, change the:

0 to the actual ID of your new NPC.

Read full topic

item.title: [EasyRSC] How do I create a new NPC?
item.dc:creator: @wesely wesely
item.description:
@wesely wrote:

To Change A npc’s Name and stats, You change the Npc.rscd file in your client.

To change the drops, and Respawn time change the server file, NPC.Def

Always Remember:

If you edit a JAVA file, then COMPILE!

If you edit a XML file, then COMPRESS!

If you edit a RSCD file, DECOMPRESS, EDIT and then COMPRESS!

Read full topic
item.source: [EasyRSC] How do I create a new NPC?
